attributes.review:
As a part of gen z, there was a lot of hype going around this app so I wanted to see what that was about. But right as I got on the app, a bright
orange person took my 80 kids and my dino nuggets. Needless to say I will NOT be using this app anymore..
attributes.title: A horrible app

attributes.review: as soon as i opened the app i saw a nude photograph of sir trumpkins touching himself. the app then asked me to enter my address. normally i wouldn’t but i would do ANYTHING to support sir  trumples 😜. 2 days after, i got a package in the mail. THEY HAD SENT ME A BAG OF SIR TRUMPINGS POOPOO!!! THIS ANGERED ME BEYOND BELIEF. I COULDNT BELIEVE MY EYES. TAKE THIS APP DOWN IMMEDIATELY. IT IS SCAMMING PEOPLE
attributes.title: i saw terrible things 🤬

attributes.review: if i could give this app zero stars i would. i can’t believe what happened after i opened this app. immediately after opening it, i experienced EXPLOSIVE diarrhea. i’m so disgusted.
attributes.title: absolutely awful

attributes.review: This app is great. It’s wonderful to get REAL and ACCURATE news that’s not filtered by the FAKE news outlets. Vote TRUMP 2020!!
attributes.title: Great for REAL & ACCURATE news

attributes.review: i woke up today, and decided to be more involved in the 2020 election. i’ve opened this app 4 times already and every single time i open the app, I LOSE SO MANY BRAINCELLS. this app promotes stupidity, racism, sexism and homophobia. it is utter garbage. please get this app off of the app store.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: I downloaded it thinking it’d be great, unfortunately it’s not. It lags and has some serious issues with displayed information. would not recommend.
attributes.title: Don’t download this app.

attributes.review:
I truly wanted to give this app a 5-star but HAD to give it a 1-star because while I was filling up my information it deleted it and the app close down I couldn’t believe it but oh well ,sincerely~
Gen-z
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: Where do I even start! The app was glitchy, and it was harder to find things. If he is going to make new social media outlets, he should make it easier since a lot of his followers are older. Horrible app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.title: So Bad!

attributes.review: This is the worst app ever it’s always crashing I see white supremacy every where. There’s this scary old orange mad that haunts my nightmares. I’m truly disgusted. I haven’t been able to eat an orange the same.
attributes.title: The volume inside of this bus is astronomical

attributes.review: 🧴🤜🥩😏wanted to beat 🤜to this app📱 for no valid reason.💁‍♀️ Not good at all, 👎I just saw a fat cheeto puff 👹and wondered🤔 if it was gonna do anything... it was quite ugly too🤮... had so white ⚪️patchy spots and wrinkles👴 so I do not recommend this app to anybody, beating or not 😤😤 imma beat to this later
